1195880.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Fantasy Girl Walking Sprite
1195880.description:
New from Gee Kun Soft, a fun pack of walking girl sprites, very useful cute new characters that need to get out and explore your game world!

Features:

* 24 female walking character sprites for RPG Maker VX and VX Ace
* assassin / dark knight / devil girl / elf / fencer / fighter / Gothic lolita / Inari / lady butler / lady knight / lady satan / kimono / magician / navy / neko musume / princess / pugilist / fairy / samurai / shaman / shrine maiden / school girl / warrior etc.
* PSD file included for editing! (You need editing software like photoshop to use PSD file)
* This pack is for use in RPG Makers or Visual Novel games only.
1195880.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 意大利语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 日语
